songs.title: Be My Daddy
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hmmmmm
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up

[Verse 1]
Lyin' on the beach and the hot sun (yeah hot)
Yeah, I want you
If you have forgotten how to have fun (c'mon)
Well, I'll show you

[Pre-Chorus 1]
You rich and I'm wishin', um
You could be my mister, yum
Delicious to the maximum
Chew you up like bubble gum
You love me, he wants me
I think I want you too

[Chorus]
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it, get it
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it alright
Be my daddy tonight

[Verse 2]
I see you shinin' bright with your gold chain on (so bright)
Drinkin' with your crew (yeah)
I give you one look and you know that it's on (it's on)
Yes, you do

[Pre-Chorus 2]
He's rich and I'm kissin' him, magical musician, uh
We drivin' through the cinema, taste like sugar cinnamon
Hey baby (wha?)
Come take me (wha?)
I'll go anywhere with you (yeah)

[Chorus]
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it, get it
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it alright
Be my daddy tonight

[Post-Chorus]
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up

[Bridge]
Sitting on your lap, singing you my song, ooh-ooh-ooh
Got a lollipop
I'll give you some
All for you-you-you-you-you-you

[Chorus]
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it, get it
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
I'm neon phosphorescent
Open like a Christmas present, oh
You can be my daddy tonight-night-night
If you're seeking heaven
Then you wanna come and get it alright
Be my daddy tonight

[Outro]
What's up
What's up
What's up
What's up
Be my daddy
Be my daddy
Be my daddy
Be my, be my daddy tonight
